searchDocs.title: debug​
searchDocs.content: </> Director.debug() → Director-- The director module for chaining. Enables debug mode for the director and all registries created thereafter.

searchDocs.title: createRegistry​
searchDocs.content: </> Director.createRegistry( name: string?,-- If not provided, a GUID will be generated. root: Folder? -- Optional Folder to serve as the root for the registry. ) → Registry<T>-- A new Registry instance. Initializes a new registry.

searchDocs.title: run​
searchDocs.content: </> Director.run( directory: Folder -- The Folder containing registry ModuleScripts. ) → Promise -- A Promise that resolves when all registries have been processed. Runs all registries found within the specified directory.

searchDocs.title: getSize​
searchDocs.content: </> Registry:getSize() → number-- The number of records in the registry. Returns the number of records in the registry.

searchDocs.title: getRecords​
searchDocs.content: </> Registry:getRecords() → {[string]: T}-- The records in the registry. Returns all records in the registry.

searchDocs.title: getEntries​
searchDocs.content: </> Registry:getEntries() → {string}-- The list of entries' IDs. Returns all entry IDs in the registry.

searchDocs.title: fetch​
searchDocs.content: </> Registry:fetch( id: string-- The ID of the record to fetch. ) → T?-- The record if found, otherwise nil. Fetches a record by its ID.

searchDocs.title: insert​
searchDocs.content: </> Registry:insert( id: string,-- The ID of the record. entry: T-- The record to insert. ) → boolean-- True if the record was inserted, false if a record with the same ID already exists. Inserts a new record into the registry.

searchDocs.title: factorize​
searchDocs.content: </> Registry:factorize( factory: (data: any) → T-- A function that takes raw data and returns a record of type T. ) → () Sets a factory function for creating records.

searchDocs.title: load​
searchDocs.content: </> Registry:load( folder: Folder? -- Optional Folder to load records from. If not provided, uses the registry's root. ) → Promise <number>-- A Promise that resolves with the number of records successfully registered. Loads records from the specified folder or the registry's root.

searchDocs.title: debug​
searchDocs.content: </> Registry:debug( enable: boolean?-- Optional boolean to enable or disable debug mode. Defaults to true if not provided. ) → Registry<T>-- The registry instance for chaining. Enables debug mode for the registry.
